contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1899 D Lee Moor Contest
Lee Moor Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
lee-moor-contest
None
Rose Queen
Lee Moor, West Yorkshire 1st prize £7., 2nd prize £4 divided between Castleford Temperance and Richardshaw Lane., 4th prize £2., 5th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Walsden Temperance, 2nd (10s.) Birstall Old. Brass Band News September 1899 shows result - 1st Birstall Old, 2nd Rickardshaw Lane, 3rd Rothwell Temperance, 4th Hepworth. 10 bands competed.
April 18, 2012, 12:45 p.m. Feb. 2, 2020, 6:55 p.m.
1 Rishworth and Ryburn William Heap
2 Castleford New Subscription J. W. Stamp
2 Richardshaw Lane Band J. A. Riley
4 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band William Heap
5 Hepworth Band John Belcher
